feed.subtitle: A simple, whitespace theme for academics. Based on [*folio](https://github.com/bogoli/-folio) design.

entry.title: Mapping the Mind of a Large Language Model \ Anthropic

link.title: Mapping the Mind of a Large Language Model \ Anthropic

entry.summary: We have identified how millions of concepts are represented inside Claude Sonnet, one of our deployed large language models. This is the first ever detailed look inside a modern, production-grade large language model.
